name: vibe-guard
description: 🛡️ Vibe-Guard Security Scanner - Catch security issues before they catch you!

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.package: npm run build && pkg dist/bin/vibe-guard.js --targets node18-macos-x64,node18-linux-x64,node18-win-x64 --out-path binaries
scripts.package:macos: npm run build && pkg dist/bin/vibe-guard.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --out-path binaries
scripts.package:linux: npm run build && pkg dist/bin/vibe-guard.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --out-path binaries
scripts.package:windows: npm run build && pkg dist/bin/vibe-guard.js --targets node18-win-x64 --out-path binaries
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run package

author: Vibe-Guard Team
